医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
MaxCyte 庆祝 25 周年推动基于细胞工程的疗法的创新MaxCyte, Inc. 是一家专注于细胞工程的领先公司，提供支持平台技术以推进下一代细胞疗法的发现、开发和商业化，今年迎来了成立 25 周年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/MaxCyte-celebrates-25-years-of-innovation-driven-cell-engineering-based-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/MaxCyte-celebrates-25-years-of-innovation-driven-cell-engineering-based-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef392615-a555-41ed-b572-89505ea5ea85 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 23:17:00 -0500 MaxCyte celebrates 25 years of innovation driving cell engineering-based therapeutics
加巴喷丁类药物可能会增加老年人髋部骨折的风险今天发表在《JAMA Network Open》上的这项研究追踪了 2013 年 3 月至 2018 年 6 月在澳大利亚维多利亚州因髋部骨折住院的患者，这些患者在受伤前曾使用过加巴喷丁类药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Gabapentinoids-may-increase-hip-fracture-risk-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Gabapentinoids-may-increase-hip-fracture-risk-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ffa6d5f-dffb-4dad-8aa3-fc9889c517d9 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 23:03:00 -0500 Gabapentinoids may increase hip fracture risk in older adults
长期新冠疫情可能每年给英国经济造成数十亿美元的损失伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，由于患者难以应对症状并重返工作岗位，因长期新冠疫情而损失的工作日可能每年给经济造成数十亿英镑的损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Long-Covid-could-be-costing-the-UK-economy-billions-each-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Long-Covid-could-be-costing-the-UK-economy-billions-each-year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73b88a2c-5fa3-4086-afc6-63d458e0fd37 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 22:58:00 -0500 Long Covid could be costing the UK economy billions each year
CAR T细胞疗法突破为治疗实体瘤带来新希望研究人员通过创新方法克服实体瘤环境的独特障碍，推进实体瘤的 CAR T 细胞疗法，并取得了有希望的临床结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/CAR-T-cell-therapy-breakthroughs-bring-new-hope-for-treating-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/CAR-T-cell-therapy-breakthroughs-bring-new-hope-for-treating-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c9eb5f1-517a-4ac1-8599-a23b52352ed8 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 22:43:00 -0500 CAR T cell therapy breakthroughs bring new hope for treating solid tumors
研究强调手术治疗中广泛存在的不良事件《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项针对美国马萨诸塞州 11 家医院住院情况的研究发现，不良事件影响了超过三分之一 (38%) 接受手术的成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Study-highlights-widespread-adverse-events-in-surgical-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Study-highlights-widespread-adverse-events-in-surgical-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a762bac-f907-4963-aa07-e1469d0ca639 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 22:37:00 -0500 Study highlights widespread adverse events in surgical care
宏基因组测序提高了中枢神经系统感染中罕见病原体的检测新的研究表明，七年来宏基因组下一代测序（mNGS）增加了具有挑战性的中枢神经系统感染的病原体检测，识别出标准测试经常遗漏的罕见和意想不到的微生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Metagenomic-sequencing-improves-detection-of-rare-pathogens-in-CNS-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Metagenomic-sequencing-improves-detection-of-rare-pathogens-in-CNS-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25ba106b-060a-42f1-8dac-006e18ab9bd7 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 22:03:00 -0500 Metagenomic sequencing improves detection of rare pathogens in CNS infections
AI技术帮助神经外科医生在脑肿瘤手术中发现隐藏的癌症该技术为提高脑肿瘤患者的生存率带来了新的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/AI-technique-helps-neurosurgeons-detect-hidden-cancer-during-brain-tumor-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/AI-technique-helps-neurosurgeons-detect-hidden-cancer-during-brain-tumor-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab4a2cbf-77c5-403f-80db-2bd8d492a632 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 22:03:00 -0500 AI technique helps neurosurgeons detect hidden cancer during brain tumor surgery
新举措旨在解决费城社区的高血压问题费城至少 33% 的人（尤其是费城西部和西南部）患有高血压。但他们中的许多人并不知道——这就是为什么这种疾病（也称为高血压）被称为“沉默的杀手”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/New-initiative-aims-to-tackle-high-blood-Pressure-in-Philadelphia-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/New-initiative-aims-to-tackle-high-blood-Pressure-in-Philadelphia-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46fb3ce2-8516-4649-8764-f7b3209f5cca Wed, 13 Nov 2024 21:57:10 -0500 New initiative aims to tackle high blood pressure in Philadelphia communities
研究人员发现治疗动脉粥样硬化的新靶点凯斯西储大学的研究人员确定了治疗动脉粥样硬化的新目标，动脉粥样硬化是一种斑块堵塞动脉并导致严重心脏问题（包括中风和心脏病发作）的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Researchers-discover-new-target-for-treating-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Researchers-discover-new-target-for-treating-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8a038af-6d39-4029-a199-e87ecaff76cc Wed, 13 Nov 2024 21:44:40 -0500 Researchers discover new target for treating atherosclerosis
创新疫苗可保护牲畜免受四种口蹄疫的侵害一种旨在保护东非牛免受所有主要口蹄疫病毒株感染的新疫苗，为与这种高度传染性疾病作斗争的小规模农民带来了希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Innovative-vaccine-shields-livestock-from-four-strains-of-foot-and-mouth-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241113/Innovative-vaccine-shields-livestock-from-four-strains-of-foot-and-mouth-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84ff86c9-6031-4778-a596-ccf6ec9340d0 Wed, 13 Nov 2024 21:34:00 -0500 Innovative vaccine shields livestock from four strains of foot and mouth disease
